statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Kevin Anderson scored 22 points and Richmond used a big second-half run to pull away from Saint Joseph's (Pa.) 69-54 on Wednesday night.
article.headline: Richmond controls St. Joe's in second half for important road win
article.linkText: Richmond improves bubble status with road rout
article.story: PHILADELPHIA -- Kevin Anderson scored 22 points and Richmond used a big second-half run to pull away from Saint Joseph's (Pa.) 69-54 on Wednesday night. The Spiders (23-7, 12-3 Atlantic 10 Conference) led 40-39 with 10:20 left to play before going on a 29-13 run to take a 69-52 lead with 1:49 to go. Richmond shot 5 for 5 from beyond the arc during that run. Justin Harper added 16 points, Dan Geriot had 14 and Darien Brothers 10 for the Spiders, who shot 16 for 29 from the floor (55.2 percent) in the second half. The Hawks (8-21, 3-12) shot 4 for 13 from the field over the final 10 minutes and finished 3 of 16 from 3-point range (18.8 percent) overall. Carl Jones scored 18 points and Ronald Roberts had 10 for St. Joseph's, which has lost four of its last five contests. Richmond led 20-19 at halftime and outscored the Hawks 49-35 in the second half.
